publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6115 Lewis Macdonald: Reopening of Glencraft—That the Parliament welcomes the reopening of the Glencraft factory in Aberdeen, which provides worthwhile employment opportunities to blind and disabled people; congratulates the community union and Glencraft staff in securing the future of the factory; acknowledges PSN’s financial support in developing a suitable business model, and believes that it is the responsibility of both the Scottish Government and Aberdeen City Council to turn aspiration into reality by providing continued support Supported by: Richard Baker*
S3M-6115 Reopening of Glencraft (lodged on 9 April 2010) Johann Lamont*
S3M-6115 Reopening of Glencraft (lodged on 9 April 2010) Jack McConnell*, David Stewart*
